backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic for patient, doctor, and family data management, including profiles, vitals, medications, appointments, alerts, and authorization helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking implemented features to source files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of several frontend files for reference and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and design tokens, including color themes, dark mode variables, and alert-state colors.
frontend/index.html: Defines the HTML shell with a root mount point and loads the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, authentication gating, role-based routing, and global layout setup.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with user menu, logout, role-aware navigation, and health chat access.
frontend/src/components/appointments/App: Lists, creates, and deletes patient appointments with a form dialog and table view.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Manages medication reminders including adding new reminders and deleting existing ones.
frontend/src/components/patient/Connecte: Allows adding and removing connected device names for a patient profile.
frontend/src/components/patient/FamilyAc: Displays family members with access and supports granting or revoking access using principals.
frontend/src/components/patient/HomeNurs: Form for submitting home nurse visit requests with date, time, and details.
frontend/src/components/patient/PatientP: Loads, displays, and edits patient profile details including medical history and connected devices.
frontend/src/components/patient/SOSButto: Provides an SOS alert button that sends an emergency notification after user confirmation.
frontend/src/components/theme/AlertStyle: Exports CSS class mappings for alert severity levels and a helper to retrieve them.
frontend/src/components/vitals/VitalsEnt: Form component that captures vitals inputs and submits them via addVitals mutation, then resets fields and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/vitals/VitalsLis: Displays a sortable table of vitals readings with status badges and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/content/healthFaq.ts: Defines FAQ entries with keyword matching and corresponding health guidance answers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current caller’s user profile using the active actor, handling loading state based on identity readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on profiles, vitals, medications, appointments, and alerts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleRouting.ts: Maps user roles to their corresponding route paths.
frontend/src/lib/chatbot.ts: Matches user questions to FAQ entries by keyword and returns the associated answer or a fallback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorDashboar: Displays a doctor's overview of patients and alerts with counts and sorted alert data. Includes navigation and visual summaries for patient management.
Shows detailed patient information including vitals, alerts, medications, appointments, and nurse requests. Fetches multiple data sources and presents them in tabbed sections.
frontend/src/pages/family/FamilyDashboar: Provides a family member’s dashboard showing the assigned patient’s basic details. Allows navigation to the patient's health status view if access is granted.
frontend/src/pages/family/FamilyPatientS: Displays a read-only family view of a patient’s profile, vitals, alerts, medications, and appointments with sorting and alert styling.
frontend/src/pages/HealthChat.tsx: Implements a simple health Q&A chatbot UI with message history, input handling, and safety disclaimer. Uses matchQuestion to generate responses and displays messages in a scrollable chat layout.
frontend/src/pages/LandingLogin.tsx: Provides the landing and login page with marketing content and Internet Identity login handling. Shows feature highlights and manages re-authentication edge cases.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingRole.tsx: Handles user onboarding by collecting name and role, validating inputs, and saving the profile. Redirects users based on role and supports family member patient linking.
frontend/src/pages/patient/PatientDashbo: Renders the patient dashboard with profile info, vitals entry, medication reminders, appointments, family access, SOS button, and nurse booking tabs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app purpose, features, requirements, issues, and image asset needs.
